sentences.sContent: The Chancellor has withstood the criticism and held firm.
sentences.sCn: 总理顶住批评，坚持立场。

sentences.sContent: ...the boxes can withstand massive force and temperatures up to 2...
...Early models often failed to withstand crashes...
...Their ability to withstand almost any disaster makes them seem like something out of a comic book...

remMethod.val: with(与…在一起) ＋ stand(站) → 武警官兵手拉手站在一起抵挡洪流 → 抵挡， 反抗

trans.tranOther: to defend yourself successfully against people who attack, criticize, or oppose you
